title: Software Engineer
summary: Currently working at Cloud Service Mesh, under GCP Networking. A Google Kubernetes Engine feature which enables service discovery, traffic routing, and observability at scale by the use of Envoy proxies.
Built and maintained alerting systems to monitor and alert about propagation health across distributed systems to ensure consistency across regionalized services (GCP, C++, Golang, Kubernetes).

Optimized and modernized end-to-end testing framework for the team, enabling a modern automatic cluster setup and detecting pre-configured clusters, resulting in a reduced runtime of 50% (30 to 15 minutes).

title: Software Engineering Intern
summary: Currently interning in Google Cloud Storage at Trusted Partner Cloud team

title: Software Engineering Intern
summary: Designed and implemented tracing tools to report +100M daily traces and analyze user errors in the frontend infrastructure for network/overall service health analytics.
Streamlined monitoring of impacted users across all platforms by communicating with stakeholders, teams, and direct responsible individuals by establishing standard telemetry conventions.
Created dashboards and queries in Grafana using PromQL and Honeycomb queries to analyze collected traces and create alerts against breaking changes in every new client build.

title: Software Development Intern
summary: Conducted meetings, communicated with cross-functional team members. Proposed implementations and improvements to senior team members and product owners in Scrum team (JIRA, Azure DevOps).
Engineered notification microservice API using GraphQL, ASP.NET and SQL Server. Connected to an internal dashboard using Angular and Redux (NgRx).
Upgraded and modernized notification system from front-end to back-end for +7000 customers to receive native Windows notifications. Added metrics and surveys for the marketing team.

title: Full Stack Development Intern
summary: Selected into a cohort of 35 interns out of 1800 applicants into CodePath's SITE program, an intense 10-week internship focused in full stack development including: Front-end, back-end, testing, design, and deployment.
Upgraded and modernized notification system from front-end to back-end for +7000 customers to receive native Windows notifications. Added metrics and surveys for the marketing team.
